Package com.koalog.util.swing.action

This package contains a set of useful actions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutAction An action that displays an "about" message on the screen.
DOMAddElement An action that add an element from a DOM.
DOMRemoveElement An action that remove an element from a DOM.
ExitConfirmation A simple action usually invoked when closing an application to get the user confirmation.
FileChooser An action that let the user choose a file.The following optional parameters are available: TYPE: used to specify whether it is an open or a save dialog.
I18NAbstractAction An internationalizable version of the AbstractAction.
I18NMenu An action used to encapsulate and internationalize menus.
LnFChooser An action that let the user choose a Look and Feel.The following optional parameters are available: LIST: a comma-separated list of available look and feel classes;
MessageAction A simple action that display a message on the screen.
NewFile A simple action that triggers the creation of a new blank file.
 

Package com.koalog.util.swing.action Description

This package contains a set of useful actions.

All actions contained in this package are internationalizable, since they derive from I18NAbstractAction.
